Package Utility

Class Alerts

java.lang.Object
Utility.Alerts
public class Alerts extends Object
Alert utility class which manages the alert messages to the user

  • Method Details

    • onLogin

      public static void onLogin()
      OnLogin method which manages the alert upon a successful user login

    • inputError

      public void inputError(ArrayList<String> errors)
      Input Error method which alerts the user of an input error(s)

      This method features a lambda expression used to append error messages and new lines to the errorMessage StringBuilder object. This greatly simplifies the code readability.

      Parameters:
      errors - A list of errors that have occurred

    • confirmDelete

      public boolean confirmDelete(String type)
      Confirm delete method which asks the user to confirm the deletion
      Parameters:
      type - The object type to be deleted (Appointment or Customer)
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating that the OK button was pressed

    • associatedApptsError

      public void associatedApptsError()
      Associated Appointment(s) error method which alerts the user if a customer attempting to be deleted has associated appointment(s)

    • nullSelection

      public void nullSelection(String type, String action)
      Null Selection method which alerts the user of a null selection error
      Parameters:
      type - Type of object that needs to be selected (Appointment or Customer)
      action - Delete or Modify

    • nullSelectionReports

      public void nullSelectionReports()
      Null Selection Reports method which alerts the user of a null selection error

    • informOfDeletion

      public void informOfDeletion(int id, String object, String type)
      InformOfDeletion method which informs the user that a deletion has been made
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the deleted object (Appointment or Customer)
      object - String value of the deleted object type
      type - Type of the deleted appointment (null if Customer)
